examples: We all speculated about the reasons for her resignation.
Todos especulamos sobre las razones de su renuncia.
They were all speculating as to the identity of the stranger.
Todos estaban especulando sobre la identidad del extraño.
It is useless to speculate why he did it.
Es inútil especular por qué lo hizo.
We can speculate that the stone circles were used in some sort of pagan ceremony.
Podemos especular que los círculos de piedra se usaron en algún tipo de ceremonia pagana.
